alert.note: Alert for Tift; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 6:15PM EDT until June 12 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Tift County in south central Georgia... Southern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 615 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sylvester, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sylvester, Tifton, Omega, Poulan, Ty Ty, Unionville, Phillipsburg, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Sumner, Bridgeboro, Eldorado, Scooterville, Sylvester Airport, Anderson City, Tempy, Parkerville, Harding, Red Rock, Crestwood and Shingler. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
